product_name: Omega Pacific Dirtbag Dash Quickdraw Rack Pack - Package of 6
long_description: Grab the Omega Pacific Dirtbag Dash Quickdraw Rack Pack to get geared up for climbing without breaking the bank. The pack includes 6 quickdraws and a locking carabiner.
